  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086035</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Clays of the Piedmont: Origins, recovery, and use</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm des Piedmonts: Ursprung, Wiederanlauf 
und Gebrauch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Argiles du Piémont : Origines, reprise, et 
utilisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Argilas do Piedmont: Origens, recuperação,
e uso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Argille del Piemonte: Origini, recupero ed 
uso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αργιλοι piedmont: Προέλευση, αποκατάσταση, και
χρήση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arcillas del Piedmont: Orígenes, 
recuperación, y uso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A "virtual field trip" through the North Carolina Piedmont and thousands of years of history explains the origin of Piedmont clays and how clay is made into pottery. With high-resolution photographs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein "virtuelles fangen Reise" durch das 
Nord-Carolina Piedmont auf und Tausenden Jahre der Geschichte erklärt
den Ursprung des Piedmont Lehms und wie Lehm in Tonwaren gebildet 
wird. Mit hochauflösenden Fotographien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"un voyage de zone virtuel" par la Caroline 
du nord Piémont et milliers des années de l'histoire explique 
l'origine des argiles de Piémont et comment de l'argile est 
transformé en la poterie. Avec les photographies à haute 
résolution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"um desengate de campo virtual" através do 
North.carolina Piedmont e milhares dos anos do history explica a 
origem de argilas de Piedmont e como a argila é feita na cerâmica. 
Com fotografias high-resolution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"un viaggio di campo virtuale" attraverso il 
North.carolina il Piemonte e migliaia degli anni di storia spiega 
l'origine delle argille del Piemonte e come l'argilla è trasformata 
terraglie. Con le fotografie ad alta definizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα "εικονικό ταξίδι πεδίων" μέσω της βόρειας 
Καρολίνας piedmont και χιλιάδες των ετών ιστορίας εξηγεί την 
προέλευση piedmont των αργίλων και πώς ο άργιλος γίνεται στην 
αγγειοπλαστική. Με τις υψηλής ευκρίνειας φωτογραφίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un "disparo al campo virtual" a través de la 
Carolina del Norte Piedmont y millares de años de la historia explica
el origen de las arcillas de Piedmont y cómo la arcilla se hace en la
cerámica. Con las fotografías de alta resolución.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
